text:
@GregAbbott_TX It is a *public health* issue.

Therefore it is not up to the individual to prioritize their liberty above the public health. 

No states have meet the CDC standards to reopen. 

#Texas
#AbbottLiesPeopleDie
#COVID19 https://t.co/ccxhsyXIlh
